purpose: Set context for the COVID-19 humanitarian challenge and the goal of the document.
title: COVID-19 Humanitarian Challenge

bullets.highlight: COVID-19 is first and foremost a major humanitarian challenge.
bullets.text: Thousands of health professionals are battling the virus, putting their own lives at risk. Overstretched health systems will need time and help to return to a semblance of normalcy.

bullets.highlight: Solving the humanitarian challenge is, of course, priority #1.
bullets.text: Much remains to be done globally to respond and recover, from counting the humanitarian costs of the virus, to supporting the victims and families, to finding a vaccine.

bullets.highlight: This document is meant to help with a narrower goal: provide consumer insights during the current COVID-19 situation.
bullets.text: In addition to the humanitarian challenge, there are implications for the wider economy, businesses, and employment. This document includes consumer insights from a survey conducted between May 9-17, May 27-29, June 16-18, July 15-17, Sept 2-4 and Nov 6-10 in UK, DE, FR, IT.

reasoning_strategy: Highlight the importance of the humanitarian challenge and introduce the document's focus.
layout: Three main bullet points with supporting text.

_why_unknown.font_family: The font family and size are not clearly specified in the image.
